text: Sergey Nikiforov (born 15 May 1966) is a Soviet skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1988 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the Soviet Union Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1988 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Sergey Nikiforov
